page.title: 03Leisure and Recreation
page.content: In their spare time in Bramley, many people walk up to the lakes where it is peaceful and quiet. They also jog around these lakes on paths and along the small stream near the High Street. There is not a cinema.There are two public houses on the High Street as well as an afternoon tea shop. There is an old railway line which is very popular for people who are walking dogs or jogging. Chinthurst Hill is another popular place for walking for the people of Bramley. Many golfers from Bramley play golf at Bramley Golf Club and some people in Bramley take up bell-ringing in the Church as a hobby on Sundays. A few people own horses in Bramley. Horse-riding is very popular as a hobby here.
